# Assignment 4 - Shiny

This assignment involves buidling interactive web apps. In this case, it is shiny


```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(glue)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)
library(shinythemes)
```


```{r}

ohs2019 <- read.csv("OHS_2019.csv", na.strings = c("","NA")) 

# Clean Names
ohs2019 <- ohs2019 %>%
  clean_names()

# Select desired variables
ohs_useful <- ohs2019 %>%
  select(field_visit_date, field_visit_type, case_type, naics_description, contravener_role, order_type, order_status, reg_name )


```
